## Motivation

## Alternatives Considered

Are there workarounds or alternative approaches that could achieve similar results?

- Are there similar features in other workflow management tools?
- Any mockups, diagrams, or examples?

## Use Case

Describe a concrete example of how you would use this feature in your workflow.
